aaron da ohuge puthrayo da itha shuddha de kapa karana pinisath, samindanan wahanse idiriyehi suwanda dum oppu karana pinisath, un wahanseta sewaya karana pinisath, sama kalhi ma un wahansege namayen aashirwada karana pinisath, hama kalata ma wen karanu labuwo ya. 14 eheth, dewiyan wahanseta kapa wu manushyaya wana mosesge puthrayo lewi gothrayata ayithi yayi ganan ganna laddo ya. 15 mosesge puthrayo nam: gershom saha eliyeser ya. 16 gershomge puthrayo nam; pradhaniya wu shebuyel ya. 17 eliyeserge puthrayo: pradhaniya wu rehebiya ya.
